mdRecord.dcterms:title: Christian social union addresses / by the late Brooke Foss Westcott
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Westcott, Brooke Foss bp. of Durham, 1825-1901
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Christian social union. 1894. Cambridge.--The Christian law. 1895. Manchester.--The aim and method of education. 1896. Bristol.--Address at the annual meeting of the Christian social union. 1897. Leicester. (Leicester daily post)--Social service. 1898. Birmingham. (Commonwealth)--Expenditure. 1899. Liverpool.--Progress. 1900. Leeds.
One copy: Photocopy. North Manchester, IN : Heckman Bindery, Inc., [2005].
Item X004847387 has bookplate data: William Jackson Morton, D.D..
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Church and social problems--Great Britain.
